mapper.update: update tb_utm_source set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parentCategory = #{parentCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform = #{platform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, charge_type = #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, abbreviation = #{abbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, landingPage = #{landingPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, downloadPage = #{downloadPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, superior = #{superior,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, description, category,parentCategory, platform, charge_type, abbreviation,principal,superior from tb_utm_source order by description, category,parentCategory, platform, charge_type

select count(*) from tb_utm_source where description like #{descriptionCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (#{categoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or category = #{categoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{parentCategoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or parentCategory = #{parentCategoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{platformCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or platform = #{platformCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{chargeTypeCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or charge_type = #{chargeTypeCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{abbreviationCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '%%' or abbreviation like #{abbreviationCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select id, description, category,parentCategory, platform, charge_type, abbreviation,landingPage,downloadPage,principal,superior from tb_utm_source where description like #{descriptionCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (#{categoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or category = #{categoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{parentCategoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or parentCategory = #{parentCategoryCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{platformCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or platform = #{platformCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{chargeTypeCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' or charge_type = #{chargeTypeCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and (#{abbreviationCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '%%' or abbreviation like #{abbreviationCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by description, category, platform, charge_type limit #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rows,jdbcType=INTEGER}
